DOC.brief_summary: To date , benefit massage chronic neck pain patient investigate singular treatment , rather part treatment package . The need research highlight literature ( Ezzo et al , 2007 ; Haraldsson et al , 2006 ) This research aim establish whether addition massage program exercise manual therapy offer additional benefit exercise manual therapy alone treatment patient chronic neck pain .
DOC.brief_title: Does Addition Massage Manual Therapy Exercise Improve Outcome Chronic Neck Pain ?
DOC.detailed_description: 39 patient neck pain great three month duration randomise either massage non-massage group primary care set Dublin region . One therapist administer treatment . Randomisation carry use sequential sampling , utilise permute block . Patients exclude study severe co-existing disease , neck pain due fracture , tumour , infection non-mechanical cause , patient diagnosis osteoporosis anywhere body . Both group underwent eight weekly physiotherapy session . The non-massage group receive exercise , manual therapy advice 30 minute intervention period , conjunction exercise program perform home . The massage group receive well Swedish massage . Follow duration treatment . A number T-tests non-parametric test conduct establish two group comparable baseline . A mixed ANOVA use analyse between-group within-group data simultaneously . No blind possible , although questionnaire self-administered may limited bias .
